languages.text: {n}Вайс замирает с открытым ртом, а затем раздраженно кривится.{/n} "Не стоило мне этого говорить. Я... не посмею вам перечить. Но хочу напомнить, что ритуал невозможен без псайкера-защитника".

{n}Weisz freezes with his mouth agape, then grimaces in irritation.{/n} "I should not have said anything. I... dare not object to your will. However, I must remind you that performing the ritual is impossible without a psychic protector."
languages.original_text: {n}Вайс замирает с открытым ртом, а затем раздраженно кривится.{/n} "Не стоило мне этого говорить. Я... не посмею вам перечить. Но хочу напомнить, что ритуал невозможен без псайкера-защитника".

{n}Weisz freezes with his mouth agape, then grimaces in irritation.{/n} "I should not have said anything. I... dare not object to your will. However, I must remind you that performing the ritual is impossible without a psychic protector."

languages.text: {n}Weisz se queda boquiabierto y luego hace una mueca de irritación.{/n} «No tendría que haber dicho nada. No... no pienso oponerme a su voluntad. Sin embargo, debo recordarle que es imposible realizar el ritual sin un protector psíquico».
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz freezes with his mouth agape, then grimaces in irritation.{/n} "I should not have said anything. I... dare not object to your will. However, I must remind you that performing the ritual is impossible without a psychic protector."

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz se queda boquiabierto y luego hace una mueca de irritación.{/n} «No tendría que haber dicho nada. No... no pienso oponerme a su voluntad. Sin embargo, debo recordarle que es imposible realizar el ritual sin un protector psíquico».

languages.text: {n}ワイズは口をポカンと開けて固まり、それから苛立ちを滲ませて険しい顔をする。{/n}「進言したのは間違いでした。私は…あなた様の意志に異を唱える勇気はありません。しかし、異能で守られなければ儀式を行うことはできないということは忘れないでください」
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz freezes with his mouth agape, then grimaces in irritation.{/n} "I should not have said anything. I... dare not object to your will. However, I must remind you that performing the ritual is impossible without a psychic protector."

traits.locale_text: {n}ワイズは口をポカンと開けて固まり、それから苛立ちを滲ませて険しい顔をする。{/n}「進言したのは間違いでした。私は…あなた様の意志に異を唱える勇気はありません。しかし、異能で守られなければ儀式を行うことはできないということは忘れないでください」

languages.text: {n}威茨张着嘴，僵在了原地，随后恼怒地皱起了眉头。{/n}“早知道这样，我就什么都不说了。我……我不敢反对您的意愿，但我必须提醒您，如果没有人提供灵能保护的话，像这样的仪式是无法举行的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz freezes with his mouth agape, then grimaces in irritation.{/n} "I should not have said anything. I... dare not object to your will. However, I must remind you that performing the ritual is impossible without a psychic protector."

traits.locale_text: {n}威茨张着嘴，僵在了原地，随后恼怒地皱起了眉头。{/n}“早知道这样，我就什么都不说了。我……我不敢反对您的意愿，但我必须提醒您，如果没有人提供灵能保护的话，像这样的仪式是无法举行的。”

languages.text: {n}Weisz erstarrt mit offenem Mund und verzieht verärgert das Gesicht.{/n} "Das hätte ich nicht sagen sollen. Ich ... stelle Euren Willen nicht infrage. Allerdings muss ich Euch daran erinnern, dass die Ausführung des Rituals ohne einen psionischen Beschützer unmöglich ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz freezes with his mouth agape, then grimaces in irritation.{/n} "I should not have said anything. I... dare not object to your will. However, I must remind you that performing the ritual is impossible without a psychic protector."

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz erstarrt mit offenem Mund und verzieht verärgert das Gesicht.{/n} "Das hätte ich nicht sagen sollen. Ich ... stelle Euren Willen nicht infrage. Allerdings muss ich Euch daran erinnern, dass die Ausführung des Rituals ohne einen psionischen Beschützer unmöglich ist."

languages.text: {n}Weisz s'immobilise, bouche bée, avant d'esquisser une grimace dépitée.{/n} « J'aurais mieux fait de me taire. Je... je n'ose m'opposer à votre volonté, mais je me dois de vous rappeler qu'il est impossible d'accomplir le rituel sans protection psychique. »
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz freezes with his mouth agape, then grimaces in irritation.{/n} "I should not have said anything. I... dare not object to your will. However, I must remind you that performing the ritual is impossible without a psychic protector."

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz s'immobilise, bouche bée, avant d'esquisser une grimace dépitée.{/n} « J'aurais mieux fait de me taire. Je... je n'ose m'opposer à votre volonté, mais je me dois de vous rappeler qu'il est impossible d'accomplir le rituel sans protection psychique. »

languages.text: {n}Weisz, ağzı açık bir hâlde donakalıyor. Ardından huzursuzca yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Hiçbir şey söylememem gerekirdi. Ben... Arzunuza karşı çıkmaya cüret edemem. Ancak bir ruhsezi koruyucusu olmadan ayini gerçekleştirmenin imkânsız olduğunu size hatırlatmalıyım."
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz freezes with his mouth agape, then grimaces in irritation.{/n} "I should not have said anything. I... dare not object to your will. However, I must remind you that performing the ritual is impossible without a psychic protector."
